name: Two large antique Berber storage pots
description: Two large antique Berber storage pots, probably 19th century

name: 20th century work
description: painted wood with a marble top, the front legs with rams' heads, mirrors on top of each of the trays of struts lined with velvet

name: An Italian specimen antique marble
description: the white marble top above four long drawers, containing 96 antique marble samples, each with handwritten label to back with sample name
